Chinese Definition:
①(魴魚)與鯿魚相似，銀灰色，腹部隆起，生活在淡水中。經濟魚類之一。

魴字的基本解释

魴
fáng
见“鲂”。

魴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fáng］
［《廣韻》符方切，平陽，奉。］
“鲂1”的繁体字。
(1)鱼名。鳊鱼的古称。体广而薄肥，细鳞，青白色，味美。
(2)今指鱼纲，鲤科。鲂属鱼。形状跟鳊鱼相似，身体侧扁，银灰色，细鳞，背部更隆起，胸部略平，腹部中央隆起。生活在淡水中。肉味鲜美。

魴字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魴； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第35
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?符方切，音房。【說文】赤尾魚。或从㫄作?。【詩·周南】魴魚赬尾。【傳】魚勞則尾赤。【疏】魴魚尾本不赤，赤故爲勞也。【陸璣疏】魴魚，廣而薄，肥恬而少力，細鱗，魚之美者。【爾雅·釋魚】魴魾。【註】江東呼魴魚爲鯿。一名魾。梁水魴尤美，故鄕語曰：居就糧，梁水魴。【正字通】魴魚小頭縮項，闊腹穹脊，細鱗，色靑白，腹內肪甚腴。又姓。【姓氏急就篇】漢有魴山。

bream
Basic explanation of words
bream

See "bream".
bream
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fáng］
["Guangyun" Fu Fangqie, Pingyang, Feng. ]
Traditional characters for "鲂1".
(1) The name of the fish. The ancient name of bream. The body is broad, thin and fat, with fine scales, bluish white, and delicious.
(2) This refers to the fish group, Cyprinidae. Bream is a fish. The shape is similar to that of a bream, the body is flat, silver-gray, fine scales, the back is more swollen, the chest is slightly flat, and the center of the abdomen is swollen. Live in fresh water. The meat is delicious.
bream
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲂; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: 1466 to 35
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Fu Fangqie, sound room. 【Said the text】Red tail fish. Or from 㫄?. 【Poem·Zhou Nan】The tail of the gurnard. [Biography] Yu Lao has red tails. 【Sparse】The tail of bream is not red, so it is hard work. [Lu Ji Shu] Bream fish, wide and thin, fat and timid but less powerful, fine scales, beautiful fish. 【Erya·Shiyu】Bream. [Note] Jiangdong bream is a bream. A shaman. Liang water bream is very beautiful, so the Chinese language says: "You have food, Liang water bream." 【Zhengzitong】The bream has small heads with narrowed heads, wide belly and domed ridges, fine scales, white color, and very fat in the abdomen. Another surname. [Surname Anxiety Chapter] There is a mountain of bream in the Han Dynasty.
